title: season award
body:
I was wondering why I do not get season award.
I've been reading the riot's standard who will be excluded from getting reward, but I was not the one.
I assumed the reason of that would be my 7days banned in April?
but that was ages ago and it is not applied to which riot stated (after October). 

I wanna clarify this thanks.

replies.body: Your ban in April was based on use of a ranked exploit, and as such carried the typical ranked penalties of a two week ban and loss of all previous season rewards as well as being ineligible for rewards in the 2015 season.

I received e-mail from riot player support (Shorty peewee) saying that 
I get :- 2 week suspention 
- all previous season rewards have ben stripped from your account 
- your account is ineligible for any and all 2014 season rewards  
but it does not disqualify your rewards in the 2015 season.
This is part of e-mail.

According to this, I deserve season awards.. I can forward e-mail to one of your staff if needed. 
looking forward your reply.

Hey ggomChef,

You're disqualified from rewards for any season that you use exploits. Because you used exploits in Season 5, your rank that you received is not representative of a rank that you earned; therefore, you don't qualify for rewards this season.
